content.label: Just amazing if your wondering about play time it took me 7 hours to beat the game 100%ing it

One of the best mobile action story games ever. 
Storyline, art, music and gameplay all top notch. 
Challenging enough to remain engaging while staying fun
and keeping the gameplay flowing.
A must play for fans of any gaming genre, 
but especially for those who love action adventure!
Enjoy!
What a great app! I like the graphics the levels and the sound affects. I will never forget Oddmar.

name.label: C R O N U S T I T A N

content.label:
Don’t buy this game! 

I can’t play this game because every time I download  the content inside the game and I came back in a day or so it needs to download the content again and again and again!!!!!

I have downloaded the content inside the game now more than 20 times please help 

This developer doesn’t care about any costumer 

UPDATE 

I deleted the app now more than 10 times and restart my iPhone 10 times 

Still the same problem!:(

Every time I leave the game alone for few hours 

It deletes the game data inside the game itself and I have to download it again every few hours?????!!!!!!

Please help

Have any of the developers played this game on iOS with a set of headphones? Any time a bee comes into the screen it is unbearable and it makes me want to turn the game off, and usually do. It’s that bad. I’d love to one day finish this otherwise great game but that bug destroys my ears and the only time I have available to play I need to use headphones, so there it is. I’ll put it to a 5 star review when that gets fixed.

Edit 1/13/2020: A developer wrote me back and gave me a solution, solid.
Smooth

I LOVED this game. But your score is locked in once you finish and you can’t reset and try again. Once I finished all the tasks in all the levels...that’s it. I’d love it more if you can hit reset and try all over again.

This game is worth the money 100%! The art style reminds me of Rayman Legends so... Ultra plus, nuff said. The gameplay is simple yet still really fun. Every boss battle felt unique and special as well. Control-wise, it’d a little awkward to get used to, but soon you get the hang of it. Overall, this game is a must play and while I do wish the game was longer, I heavily recommend it for someone looking for a platformer or any mobile game made with decency.
Good story line, excellent controls and fun gameplay.

Bees audio is broken. Or the designers are sadists. The music cuts out, the volume shoots up and it sounds like someone’s dragging metal across a chalkboard then playing that sound through a blown out speaker.

Fix. This.
Then controls are not good, game is great
Probably the best looking game on iOS, and easily one of the best platform game of this generation, if not the best.

Pretty good game, but control choice for run/jump, coupled with difficulty for some levels, can make this game very very annoying at those times.  Get tired of repeatedly doing a section until do everything just right to get through it.  That said, still a good game.

title.label: Best game I’ve ever bought for my phone

content.label: Nothing else to really say. Quality is unparalleled compared to any other game I’ve tried on my phone. I honestly wish I could play it on console or pc. No micro transaction bs. A shining beacon of what mobile gaming can be when it’s not busy being garbage.
Love the game and the graphics but the touch screen controls are quite poor.  Not sure how they can improve these but I have died so many times as a result of a non jump or missed weapon swing

I liked the game, but I became too frustrated with the controls, so I deleted. The input areas to press are too tightly spaced. A better method of control input would be to sense if someone lifted the finger and pressed the screen in a different direction than the previous position. I would have enjoyed the game a lot more with a real controller, but the touchscreen inputs could also be improved to make the controller less necessary.

So far I have had a blast with this game it reminds me of the Xbox game Rayman Legends the only problem I have with this game is the shop I wish you could access the shop from your menu and not have to find it in a specific level but overall this is a great game for its price and I recommend this game to all
This game is a great platformer. Controls and graphics are top notch. Highly recommended.
Enjoy the adventure and action... Beautiful grafic

title.label: Best action/adventure game on iPhone IMO

content.label: Fantastic graphics, action, puzzles, variety of enemies/landscapes, and nice music and storyline. Worth every penny!
Amazing graphics and design! One of best games I’ve ever played.

This game deserves an award, its a beautiful game with a great gameplay, sometimes i lost myself in the levels! If you like Sonic or Mario... You are gonna love it.
(And use controllers)

title.label: One of the best games I’ve played Period!!!

content.label: I don’t normally write reviews for games... But I throughly enjoyed this game it was so much fun. This game was challenging! A true masterpiece... I would’ve easily paid $20 for it!!! I hope they make a second one!!

title.label: Why are there electric machinery in this game lol?

content.label: Awesome game, make a second one
This game is my favorite right next to Swordigo.  Could not stop playing until the end.  I will play it several times and wish there were more levels.  Wonderful!

Good game, but I found it boring. Story was cute but ehhh... Too keep me interested it needs to have more depth. It feels too kiddy like. So, if it’s kiddy like then it needs to be stupid fun and addicting. lol One way to do that is have some kind of level up system but I didn’t see that anywhere. I guess I’m just a hard critic.
This is just fun game with a great animation and story!

The design of the game is great, but since the update to iOS13, each level of the game has to be redownloaded each time the app is opened, effectively requiring an internet connection to play... a FAST internet connection.

This is absolutely the best platform action adventure game on iOS. Well worth the $5. There is 0 iap in the game,which is great.  Been playing for only an hour and can’t put it down. Graphics are incredible and so are the controls. Purchase this game you will not regret it!!
I’m writing this review after having just played through the game. Touch controls and even PS4 controller support is superb. I will revisit this game again and again.
This is action packed.  I love this game.  Please create more like these please.  Thanks
loved everything about it

title.label: Truly One of The Very Best iOS Games

content.label: This game is so great, I’m happy and sad that I’ve finished all the levels. The touch controls are the best, I don’t think I’ve played a side scroller that the touch controls didn’t get in the way before. The story is well told, the levels are challenging, such a great game. Buy it, you won’t regret.
Una autentica maravilla

This is the best game for adults and kids. There are no ads in several levels and game difficulty gets to a high standard but achievable. The game is very engaging and has the best graphics I have seen.
I’ve only been playing this for a little while and best game I’ve ever owned

I loved this game so much, the story line was amazing and bosses were on point with the mythology and just amazing graphics, wow, please PLEASE make a second game I will buy that above anything else. Thanks so much!
This is a great game. I don’t mean “this is a great game for mobile”. This would be a great game on mobile or PC or console.
Love the game, but it takes a long time to download just one level.

Fun art and story. The gameplay has been smooth and quirky. This is the first game I decided to try on iPadOS 13 with an XBox One S Bluetooth controller. It has been a very enjoyable experience on my 12.9 iPad Pro. I have only cleared 3 levels so far though. I am glad I waited for the controller compatibility as platformers on touchscreens always feel compromised to me. 

I definitely see myself replaying levels to get all that I can get out of them.

The game seemed legitimately amazing at first but I paid $5.00 for a game where I can not make it to level two because it needs to finish downloading... it has been over 3 hours?!? My phone is brand new too! 
Can I get a refund?
Sometimes you tap to attack or swipe up to jump and the game doesn’t do these things.

Love the visuals and fast paced rhythm played the first 5 levels and I’m hooked.
The fact that this game has a story is huge, they did a great job of creating a character the player actually cares about, has all the fun of old school games with collectibles and blends it with upgrading items. It’s great you’ll have a good time download it!

title.label: Great game but won’t work offline

content.label:
I bought this game to play on my daily commute on the subway but every time I open it it redownloads all the levels.  So basically if I open it with minimal reception I can’t play until the game files are downloaded.  Again.  And by then my subway ride is half way over or over.  Meh.  

Other than that it’s a fantastic game.
Don't get it it’s bad game
Great visuals for a iPhone game, great voice work, gameplay is fun

if you love badland series . certainley love this
buy the game its a beautiful game with great gameplay

Oddmar is a beautiful game with fantastic animations and fluid gameplay. As far as platformers go, it’s very forgiving, making it worth playing even if you don’t usually like platformers. My only complaint is that the controls can sometimes be difficult/unresponsive, though that is more a flaw of the platform rather than the game itself. Worth every penny.
Fun! Great graphics and story.  Wish there was sound....
I love the game, but even on WiFi the levels won’t download, I paid for the game and I can’t even play most of it. Very frustrating
